dict.acceptation: 或，或者；还是；不然，否则；左右；

sent.orig: All patriots belong to one big family, whether they rally to the common cause early or late.; All patriots belong to one big family, whether they come forward early or late.
sent.trans: 爱国一家，爱国不分先后。

sent.orig: Do you do aerobics or play tennis, or anything like that?
sent.trans: 你是做有氧健身操还是打网球，或是其他类似的活动？

sent.orig: Don't just do things simply for the sake of a raise or a promotion or a byline.
sent.trans: 不要只为一次发财、升迁或露脸做事情。

sent.orig: Experience teachs me that whatever a fellow-guest may have of power to instruct or to amuse when he is sitting in a chair, or standing on a hearth-rug, quickly leaves him when he takes one out for a walk.
sent.trans: 经验告诉我们，无论哪一个与我一同作客的人，当他坐在椅子里或站在炉前地毯上的时候，他可能具有教导或逗乐的精力；当他陪别人出去散步的时候，他的这种精力很快就不见了。

sent.orig: I don't care to see plays or films that depict murders or violence.
sent.trans: 我不喜欢看描写谋杀或暴力的戏剧或电影。
